stories.text: When i'm under work stress looking at same sex sometimes i get these thoughts because of this stress/anxiety goes up and i will have panic attacks,i'm straight guy who is intrested in only girls these thougths started some 2 years back when i'm bullied by some team members becuase of my shyness i was not opening up with the other colleagues who happens to be all the girls. from that time on these thoughts are blockmailing me any suggestions to this innocent boy.Thanks
stories.title: How did you get rid of sexual obsessive thoughts?

stories.title: Ask HN: How did you break in into the tech industry?
The Myth of Decentralization and Lies about Web 2.0

stories.text:
There is this great literature site I used to love, which closed down some years ago. My only consolation was to visit the Wayback Machine and read all the pages there. I was wondering how many other great sites I am missing because they are no longer accessible. Do you have any suggestions?

In an ironic twist, I have just discovered that the site has been taken down from the Wayback Machine. It is redirecting now to a new site the authors are creating. It pains me to say it looks inferior in every single way, and most of the original content is gone. Their prerogative, I suppose.
stories.title: Ask HN: What defunct websites would you love to see revived?
